Weddings

We design wedding decors that capture the imagination. Our range of decorations include everything from chair covers, to table centrepieces, head table arrangements, drape backdrops and lights. Our team of decorators will work with you to create your perfect decor.

View Gallery

Parties & Celebrations

Our party decorations are designed to provide the perfect backdrop for your birthday, office convention or award ceremony. Create a classy look with our range of sophisticated chair covers, table pieces and entrance decorations.

View Gallery

Kids

Create the perfect ‘Kids Party’ for your child with our range of themed decorations based around your child’s favourite character. We have all the essentials for a great party including costumes, cake accessories, party bags and fun-filled games that all your child’s friends would enjoy.

View Gallery

About Us

A&A Party Poppers are a team of events and wedding venue decorations specialists based in London. We pride ourselves on our ability to transform any venue decor into something truly magical. Our energetic team of decorators put all their experience, passion and love into every venue they decorate, large or small.
